Tutorial
Swipe through the tutorial to learn about the app\!
Press New to take two pictures to merge
Press Gallery to see all pictures
Press Share to share your pictures on Facebook, Whatsapp or Gmail
Press the red button to take a picture
Press "Save File" if you want to save the picture to merge later
Press "Save" to use this picture in the merging process
Press "Retake" in order to retake the first picture
Use the overlay of the first picture to help position the second picture. Press the red button to take the picture.
Press "Save" to use this picture in the merging process
Press "Retake" in order to retake the second picture

Press "Keep" and then color the part of the picture you would like to crop and add to the first picture In this screen you will choose what area from the second image you want to crop and merge to the first image you took. You will mark the area that you want and don\'t want using strokes on the screen.
Press "Keep" and then color the part of the picture you would like to crop and add to the first picture
Press "Discard" to color the part of the picture to discard
Press "Undo " to undo the last action
Press "Done" when you have marked which areas to keep and which to discard
For best results, mark the full area to crop in white \(especially around the edges\)\, and a closed grey circle around that area to mark what to discard
Wait until your image is processed. \(This can take a minute or two.\)
Be patient\.\.\. 50 percent to 75 percent takes the longest
In this screen you can move the cropped area to the final position. Also you can erase pixels from the cropped area the algorithm didn\'t cropped well.
Press "Erase" to erase the unwanted area in your cropped picture
Press "Undo " to undo the last action
Press "Move" and then slide the cropped image to the desired place in the picture \(use the red cursor to help set the picture\)
Press "Done" when you have finished editing the picture
Name the picture and press "Done" to save the picture
